definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: There are at least two distinct Gungan races.
sentences.chinese: 岡根人至少有兩個明顯的族類。

sentences.english: 5There they are, overwhelmed with dread, for God is present in the company of the righteous.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那裏大大的害怕，因爲神在義人的族類中。

sentences.english: It is predominately the White and Asian races that have lost their ability to ground.
sentences.chinese: 主要是白人和亞洲族類丟失了錨定的能力。

sentences.english: In Christ we will be a people growing in holiness.
sentences.chinese: 在基督裏，我們將會成爲一個在聖潔中成長的族類。

sentences.english: This is the one sex-specific element that didn't change across species.
sentences.chinese: 這種性狀元素不會跨族類的發生變化。

sentences.english: There they are, overwhelmed with dread, for God is present in the company of the righteous.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那裏大大的害怕，因爲上帝在義人的族類中。

sentences.english: The race, what I need to pay them justice.
sentences.chinese: 非我族類，有什麼必要對它們講究公平。

sentences.english: Killing things that are new and different is bad, alone or with another ODST.
sentences.chinese: 單人或跟隊友殺死非我族類的怪物是不好的。

sentences.english: It thus comes to itself, to its truth: it enters upon existence as a free Kind self-subsistent.
sentences.chinese: 從而，它就進到作爲自由的族類爲自己本身而實存。

sentences.english: Through the cross, it was possible that all of Adam's race could be reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 因着十字架的緣故，亞當的族類有可能全然與神和好。

sentences.english: There were they in great fear: for God is in the generation of the righteous.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那裏大大的害怕，因爲神在義人的族類中。

definition: (idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
to whisper to one another's ear
to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
lit. seeing others go hunting, one is excited by memories of the thrill of the hunt (idiom)/fig. seeing others do what one loves to do, one is inspired to try it again
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
